title: Parabola
creator_credit: Jonathon Dawson and Australian Broadcasting Commission
brief_description: Analyses the motion of projectiles. Leads to the presentation of a parabola as a smooth, symmetrical curve having a maximum (or minimum) point. From the series “Visions in mathematics”.
